# The below flow can be rendered using mermaid.js -> (https://mermaid.live/). Generated by Copilot too :D

graph TD;
    A[User] --> B[Download Podcast];
    B --> C[Transcribe Podcast];
    C --> D[Generate Summary];
    C --> E[Extract People];
    C --> F[Extract Highlights];
    D --> G[View Summary, People Mentioned, and Highlights];
    E --> G;
    F --> G;
    G --> H[Podcast Summarizer Web Application];
